com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class MotionSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.Sensors
      • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.MotionSensor

  • public class MotionSensor
extends Sensors
    MotionSensor class is based on push model and extends from Sensor and communicates motion-detection to the gateway.
